definitions: A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem
examples: The sorting algorithm is very efficient

definitions: The occurrence of events by chance in a happy way
examples: Finding that book was pure serendipity

definitions: Lasting for a very short time
examples: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral
Smartphones are ubiquitous in modern society

definitions: A typical example or pattern of something
examples: This represents a new paradigm in education

definitions: Open to more than one interpretation
Able to recover quickly from difficulties

examples: He was meticulous in his research

definitions: Combine elements to form a whole
